# isTrashed

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether an item is in the trash.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var isTrashed: Bool { get }
```

## Specifying Content Location

- **parentItemIdentifier**: The persistent identifier of the item’s parent folder.
- **symlinkTargetPath**: The target of the symlink.

items.description: The persistent identifier of the item’s parent folder.
items.name: parentItemIdentifier
